response.original_title: Guns N' Roses - Live Estadio Nacional, Santago, Chile 1992
response.overview: Live performance from Estadio Nacional, Santiago, Chile on December 2nd 1992. This set captures the band at their raucous best midway through the epic tour, performing a cross‐section of their best‐known material as well as numerous covers in front of 85,535 people, the largest crowd ever to attend the National stadium.
response.title: Guns N' Roses - Live Estadio Nacional, Santago, Chile 1992
